response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will bring you unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a significant saving of $150,000 compared to its true value, making it an exceptional deal for you. I believe this price reflects the quality and importance of the product while allowing me to maintain a fair profit. I look forward to discussing this offer further and hope to see this product enrich your life soon. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 1350000}
